Notes: DERCapabilities are not generally writable but the corresponding setting is.

Bitmap Position (0 = over current, 1 over voltage, 2 under voltage, 3 over frequency, 4 under frequency, 5 voltage imbalance, 6 current imbalance, 7 emergency local, 8 emergency remote, 9 low power input, 10 phase rotation)
DER Generator Status (0 = Connected, 1 = Available, 2 = Operating, 3 = Test, 4 = Fault/Error)
DER Inverter Status (0 = Connected, 1 = Available, 2 = Operating, 3 = Test, 4 = Fault/Error)
DER OperationalModeStatus (0 = Not applicable, 1 = Off, 2 = Operational, 3 = Test)
DER Storage Status (0 = Connected, 1 = Available, 2 = Operating, 3 = Test, 4 = Fault/Error)
